title: Post
description: A post in a Sublinks community attributable to an author.

id.description: The unique identifier for the post.

title.description: The display title of the post.

community.description: A bio of the actor (bio for person, summary for community/group).

published.description: The date and time the post was published.

sensitive.description: Whether the post has sensitive (NSFW) content or not.
